channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report X-2025020165
item.description:
Report X-2025020165

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-22
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking after it fell from a pallet and was crushed by a forklift. Shipment is 4-piece MPS - 1 box damaged. UN1263 Paint, Related Material. All packed in one fiberboard box, UN 4GY/31.0/S/23 USA/+CC6942. Inner contents: 1 metal can @ 1.5 L (Leaking and covered in gray paint), 1 metal can @ 0.5L (PPG, 9008B Activator Component Desothane HD, Batch#C12330016-1204), 1 plastic bottle (PPG Mica Grey, PN9008FCC-2XCAQ11B, Order#PO455167, Batch#S-97043) All contents were placed in a salvage drum and held for shipper disposition.
